subs.text: Today's song: For the benefit of Mr Kite.
Twitter thread: "These days I see twitter as an essential utility. Largely because the API is so good."
BTW, "Drummer" will have a collection of built-in Twitter verbs.
"Use the product for its intended purpose." This is something I say to myself and people I work with, a lot. A steady drumbeat, to stay on track.

I watched the beginning of President Biden's press conference today. Both VP Harris and the president gave very good talks.  Sometimes their cadence is wrong, they speak in typos,  and other times (like today) I say YEAH that's right, that's how you do it.
It would be amazing if all software developers used compatible back-end databases.
